      • settings

        Initialise the setting of the window size.
        Overrides:

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Load all resources such as images. Initialise the elements such as the player, enemies and map elements.
        Overrides:
        setup in class processing.core.PApplet

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed()
        Receive key pressed signal from the keyboard. If key = r and the game has ended, reset the game. If key = e or ESC, resign and end the game. If key = a, turn on/off the AI.
        Overrides:
        keyPressed in class processing.core.PApplet

      • keyReleased

        public void keyReleased()
        Deprecated. 
        Receive key released signal from the keyboard.
        Overrides:
        keyReleased in class processing.core.PApplet

      • mousePressed

        public void mousePressed(processing.event.MouseEvent e)
        Detects mouse pressed event. Change the player's turn and tell the game to flash on the king's tile when a move that does not prevent king from being checked is called.
        Overrides:
        mousePressed in class processing.core.PApplet
        Parameters:
        e, - The mouse event.

                      int startY,
                      int endX,
                      int endY)
        Moves the piece selected, perform castling/ pawn to queen/ change the status of kings and rooks (moved or not).
        Parameters:
        startX, - The starting row.
        startY, - The starting column.
        endX, - The destination row.
        endY, - The destination column.

      • getValidMove

        public int[][] getValidMove(int rowChosen,
                            int colChosen,
                            char[][] board)
        Modify the legal move for each piece in special cases (blocking, capturing). Identify the piece from the row and column. Does not take check conditions into account.
        Parameters:
        rowChosen, - The row selected.
        colChosen, - The column selected.
        board, - The board.
        Returns:
        A 2D array showing the legal moves with 0 = illegal, 1 = legal, 2 = the piece itself.

      • drawValidMove

        public void drawValidMove()
        Highlighting legal moves.

      • isEnemy

        public boolean isEnemy(char piece1,
                       char piece2)
        Check if a piece is an enemy to the other.
        Parameters:
        piece1, - The first piece.
        piece2, - The second piece.
        Returns:
        Whether they are enemy or not.

      • check

        public boolean check(char king,
                     char[][] board)
        Identify check.
        Parameters:
        king, - The king (either k or K).
        board, - The board.
        Returns:
        Whether the king is under check or not.

      • drawCheck

        public void drawCheck(char king)
        Highlight a king's tile if it is being checked.
        Parameters:
        king, - The king (either k or K).

      • vmCheckLimit

        public int[][] vmCheckLimit(int rowChosen,
                            int colChosen)
        Modify the legal move under check condition.
        Parameters:
        rowChosen, - The row selected.
        colChosen, - The column selected.
        Returns:
        A 2D array that stores the legal moves for that specific piece (2 = the piece itself, 1 = legal, 0 = illegal).

      • checkmate

        public boolean checkmate(char king)
        Identify checkmate.
        Parameters:
        king, - The king (either k or K).
        Returns:
        Whether the king specified is checkmated or not.
